presentationColumns.name: Renewal Opportunities Win Rate
presentationColumns.description: The Win Rate of the Renewal Opportunities. This metric is computed as follows: (# of Won Renewal Opportunities/# of Won+Lost renewal Opportunities)
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Header.Renewal Opportunities Win Rate

presentationColumns.name: Renewal Opportunities Loss Rate
presentationColumns.description: The Loss rate of the Renewal Opportunities. This metric is computed as follows: (# of Lost Renewal Opportunities/# of Won+Lost renewal Opportunities)

presentationColumns.name: Renewal Opportunities Conversion Rate
